name: Rafa the Fluff
description:
LOWREZJAM 2016 entry.

You are a fluff named Rafa that really, really want's to get the hell outta there, so you need to help him find the key to unlock the doors to his freedom.

It's a really short game, only 3 levels.
I hope that you find it fun to play. If so, please let me know.
This was my first gamejam ever :)

The game was made using Flixel-GDX.

If you want to support me you can also do that by clicking on the following button :)
